p: The immobilization kinetics of P. stutzeri on CK and CP materials are shown in Figure 4. The results indicate that for all CK materials the immobilization process advanced linearly with the interaction time until the third hour and equilibrium was reached after. The linear zone was attributed to the migration of the cells from the bulk cell suspension to the particle surfaces, while the plateau region corresponded to the diffusion of P. stutzeri from the surface to the interior of the pores [ 20].
